verbs.description: [ARG0: atlanta airport blackout] [V: causes] [ARG1: major travel mess] a sudden power outage at the hartsfield - jackson atlanta international airport around 1 p m sunday grounded scores of flights and stranded thousands of passengers inside the dark terminals with no information and little to no cell phone service one delta flight coming in and going out to atlanta from albany was canceled sunday albany atlanta airport hartsfield jackson atlanta international airport
